Description.Text: The hotel is located in Beaconsfield, United Kingdom. Easily accessible from Heathrow Airport, the Gerrards Cross Railway Station and the M40, Crowne Plaza Gerrards Cross hotel is a convenient base for business or leisure travellers alike. Set back from the road on landscaped grounds, we're just a few miles from the charming town centre of Beaconsfield.

1269 Restaurant, Bar & Grill - Enjoy world class British cuisine cooked to perfection, every time. Our Restaurant and Lounge offer a comprehensive selection of dishes influenced from the local area, providing freshly prepared food to meet everyone's tastes. 1269 Restaurant is closed. 1269 Restaurant, Bar and Grill - Located on the 1st Floor 1269 Restaurant, Bar and Lounge is where you can enjoy a wide variety of foods from the finest Homemade Burger to the traditional Club Sandwich. Whether you require an area to dine or an informal setting to converse 1269 has it al.
